images.name: What to make of George Pickens' Week 14 fantasy dud
images.caption: Field Yates, Daniel Dopp and Mike Clay break down George Pickens' disappointing night against the Lions.

articles.description: Cowboys coach Brian Schottenheimer said he will have a conversation with George Pickens about the wide receiver's social media post, which he has since deleted, in response to criticism he received from former All-Pro cornerback Richard Sherman.
articles.headline: Cowboys coach: Will talk to Pickens about Sherman post

articles.headline: Fantasy football flex and superflex rankings for Week 14

articles.description: The Seahawks will get safety Julian Love and defensive tackle Jarran Reed back for their Week 14 game against the Falcons, with both starters in line to return off injured reserve.
articles.headline: Seahawks safety Julian Love, DT Jarran Reed set to return from IR

images.caption: Baltimore Ravens quarterback Lamar Jackson (8) warms up before the game against the Dallas Cowboys at AT&T Stadium.

images.name: Is Lamar Jackson missing practice cause for concern?
images.caption: Jason McCourty breaks down what concerns him about Lamar Jackson after the Ravens quarterback didn't practice Thursday.

articles.description: Quarterback Lamar Jackson said his injured ankle feels "pretty good" ahead of Sunday's crucial matchup between the Ravens and Steelers, which Jackson labeled a "playoff game."
articles.headline: Ravens QB Jackson cleared for 'playoff game' vs. Steelers
